df = pd.read_csv("../input/airpassengers-dataframe/AirPassengers.csv")
df["Avg"] = df.mean(axis=1,skipna=True)
df["Sum"] = df.iloc[:,:12].sum(axis=1,skipna=True)
df["Year"] = [i for i in range(1949,1961)]
